Detailed Description

Representation of a single basic block within the CFG. The edges between nodes are represented by Preds and Succs, together these give the flow of control for a function.

Is this block an artificial exit block?

int BasicBlock_t::BbId

ID of this basic block.

bool BasicBlock_t::Fallthru

Can this block fallthru to the next in the chain? This can happen with if statements which fallthru is the cond_expr is false.

set<CIdentifierTreeNode*, CompIdentifiers> BasicBlock_t::DefinedVars

Values which are defined in this block.

Uses of values within this block.
